text: Jan Mashiani was a South African track and field athlete who competed in the 1904 Summer Olympics in the marathon. He finished thirteenth of the fourteen finishers, but moved up to twelfth after Frederick Lorz was disqualified. == See also == * South Africa at the 1904 Summer Olympics == References == * Category:South African male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of South Africa Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1904 Summer Olympics Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing
title: Jan Mashiani
